definitions.definition: The condition of being fit , suitable or appropriate .
The cultivation of an attractive and/or healthy physique.
An organism 's or species ' degree of success in finding a mate and producing offspring .
The condition of being attractive , fanciable or beautiful .

main_definition: The condition of being fit , suitable or appropriate .
secondary_definitions: The cultivation of an attractive and/or healthy physique.
( evolutionary theory ) An organism 's or species ' degree of success in finding a mate and producing offspring .
( UK , slang ) The condition of being attractive , fanciable or beautiful .
